newsitem.title: SPAIN: SOCCER-NEW CONTRACT PUTS $36 MILLION PRICE TAG ON REAL'S HIERRO.
newsitem.headline: SOCCER-NEW CONTRACT PUTS $36 MILLION PRICE TAG ON REAL'S HIERRO.

text.p: International defender Fernando Hierro has renewed his contract with Real Madrid who have put a five billion peseta ($36 million) price tag on him.
"I've been here eight years, and I think the best is yet to come. Now I hope to win everything for (Real) Madrid," Hierro, 28, said on Tuesday. Hierro has signed with Real until 2002.
He is expected to earn around 300 million pesetas ($2.16 million) a season.
The 48-times international has found his goalscoring touch in the past two games by converting free-kicks against both Deportivo Coruna and Barcelona.
Real are expected to begin renegotiating the contract of fellow central defender Rafael Alkorta in the next few weeks.
